data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My uncle loves to tell stories about going to restaurants with my grandfather when he was young. My ____ ordered ____ same ____ every ____ - a glass ____ water ____ a ____. He didn't want ____, ____, ____ meat, and ____ ordered ____. My uncle still doesn't understand why they went to eat at a restaurant at all!
data.partBlankContent: My uncle loves to tell stories about going to restaurants with my grandfather when he was young. My grand______ ordered t__ same th___ every ti__ - a glass o_ water a__ a sa___. He didn't want br___, pa___, o_ meat, and ne___ ordered des____. My uncle still doesn't understand why they went to eat at a restaurant at all!
data.answer: 我叔叔喜欢给我讲他年轻时和我爷爷一起去餐馆吃饭的故事。我爷爷每次都会点同样的东西——一杯水和一份沙拉。他不想吃面包，意粉或者肉，也从不点甜品。我叔叔始终不明白他们究竟为什么要去餐馆吃饭!
